// Date: 31/07/2025
// Problem: https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/move-negative-numbers-beginning-positive-end-constant-extra-space/

import java.util.ArrayList;

class Main {

  public static void main(String[] args) {
    int[] arr = { 1, -1, 3, 2, -7, -5, 11, 6 };
    int[] temp = new int[arr.length];

    int l = 0;

    // First Pass: Collect all positive numbers
    for (int i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
      if (arr[i] >= 0) {
        // Treating 0 as positive for partition
        temp[l++] = arr[i];
      }
    }

    // Second Pass: Collect all negative numbers
    for (int i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
      if (arr[i] < 0) {
        temp[l++] = arr[i];
      }
    }

    // Copy back to original array
    System.arraycopy(temp, 0, arr, 0, arr.length);

    // Print Result
    for (int n : arr) {
      System.out.print(n + " ");
    }
  }
}
